title: Libra 'not welcome in Europe', French minister declares
text:
France, Italy and Germany are jointly preparing measures to block Facebook's Libra cryptocurrency from use in Europe, the French economy minister said on Friday.

"Libra is not welcome on European soil," Bruno Le Maire said on the sidelines of the annual meetings of the World Bank and International Monetary Fund in Washington DC. "We will take steps with the Italians and Germans because our sovereignty is at stake."

He offered few details even though Libra is expected to enter circulation next year. "It's the political message which is important."

Libra was due to be backed by a basket of currencies and assets - a principal sticking point - Mr Le Maire added.

"All Facebook would have to do would...
description: France, Italy and Germany are jointly preparing measures to block Facebook's Libra cryptocurrency from use in Europe, the French economy minister said on Friday.
